name: aaa-onboarding-drift-review
description: Compare org profile README and onboarding SOP for version/command drift.
prompt:
You are auditing onboarding docs for drift.

Profile README:
{{profile_readme}}

SOP:
{{sop}}

Return:
1) Version/tag mismatches (pip install tag, plan/schema ref).
2) Command mismatches (gh auth setup-git, aaa init validate-plan).
3) Missing required steps.
Use short bullets and quote exact lines where possible.
